about_the_game:
Behemoths have invaded and flattened cities all over the world. Humanity is on the brink of extinction. You are the pilot of Crimson Slayer, the world’s largest and most powerful mech, and the last mech standing.


Explore different fight styles, from pistols to melee, and unleash awesome firepower to become the ultimate defender against the monstrous threat.


FEATURES:

  • Destroy enemies using a combination of sword plus gunplay. Master different weapons. Figure out your fighting style. Dual-wield swords or pistols. Swing a mace with a grenade launcher. Defend with one, attack with another, it’s up to you.
  • Be an all-powerful, unstoppable killing machine. Kill a seemingly endless swarm of monsters in different ways.
  • Random maps for each run
  • Ultimate attacks to be unlocked - Orbital strikes, drones, missile barrages & more
  • In-game achievements provide unique upgrades and rewards

CONTENT DRILLDOWN:

  • 8 different weapons (such as the Hellfury Mace, Doom Saw, Minigun, Grenade Launcher, Beam Caster)
  • 5 levels (each level has 3 to 4 different maps) and 5 big bad bosses
  • 50 different Perks/Upgrades: Faster reloads, triple fire, life leech, extra damage. Stack them to create an ultimate weapon
  • 5 Overloads, ultimate attacks to get you out of tough spots - Ultrabeam (Ironman!), Doom Fists (Hadoken!), etc.
  • 39 types of enemies
  • Each level - average 450 enemies
  • 38 achievements (adds to your points to get upgrades)
  • Future upgrades may include a game level designer, ability to change stats, etc.




Random skill upgrade choices are given after each enemy wave. Stack them to create a unique combo. Tailor them to your own play style. Become more powerful the longer you survive. Your mech can become OP!

Engage in intense battles against waves of monstrous Behemoths in this rogue-like game. As the skilled pilot of the Crimson Slayer, upgrade your weapons and mech to face increasingly challenging foes.

Unravel the mystery behind the Behemoths' origins as you progress through each level, defeating powerful bosses and collecting rewards.

NOTES:

  • Comfort level: Comfortable. Minimal movement. Ideal for those who have not developed 'VR legs', have motion sickness.
  • Ideal for players with small physical space to play in.
  • Content Creators: If you need more graphics and logos and keyed out mech and monsters- please visit:
  • Join our Discord channel for more feedback, updates and chat directly with the devs.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480 or higher
  • VR Support: Steam VR, Meta Quest 2 and Meta Quest 3
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: VR rogue-like, arcade-style shoot-them-up. Pilot the Crimson Slayer, the last giant mech and humanity’s final hope. Slash waves of giant monsters with your sword & blast them with your minigun. Upgrade your weapons & tech along the way, find your fighting style, defeat bosses and level up!
